TopicTitle: Career Contract not accepted, any tips ?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

  What might be the problem with the contract. I have created a "base" with 8 spaces for living, it does have Antenna (Relay antenna but still), It is landed, has solar panels and batteris and it is just standing there? Might it be the Relay antenna ?

  Thanks a lot!

If the craft docked with another vessel the "fabrication date"  become the oldest of the two vessels.  So it may be the case the game don't consider it a new outpost 

Since everything else is correct my suggestion is to use the debug menu to complete the mission.
Does it have a probe core?
Just noticed what Physics Student did -- CommNet is reporting a dead craft. No command point, no probe core.

Yep,  lack of probecore prevent contracts completion. 

However I wondering why the contract didn't completed before decoupling from whatever was used to delivery it. 

If the OP just didn't waited 10s is somewhat easy to solve. But if he used a old vessel then redoing(or cheating) the mission will be required.
